notes: Does not interrupt the user's channeling spells upon toggling.
Can regenerate up to 45 mana in one minute.
The aura's buff lingers for 0.5 seconds.
abilities.description: Grants 0.75 mana regeneration and 2 armor in a 1200 radius. Deactivate aura to stop affecting non-hero units.

trivia: Basilius is derived from the Greek word Basileus, meaning "king" or "emperor".
tips: When the Basilius Aura is on, allied creeps gain an additional 2 armor, which is useful if you want to push the creep advantage in a lane. The aura should be turned off if you do not want the lane to get pushed.
In the early game and even into the mid game, the boost of mana regen is extremely useful for heroes with low intelligence growth like Troll Warlord.
